name: Wrist Pain Relief Routine
description: Targeted exercises for computer workers to relieve wrist pain and prevent repetitive strain injuries

exercises.name: Wrist Circles
exercises.notes: Rotate wrists 10x clockwise, 10x counterclockwise. Focus on smooth, controlled movement.

exercises.name: Prayer Stretch
exercises.notes: Palms together, lower hands keeping palms touching. Feel stretch in forearms.

exercises.name: Reverse Prayer Stretch
exercises.notes: Back of hands together, gently press. Stretch top of forearms.

exercises.name: Wrist Flexor Stretch
exercises.notes: Arm straight, pull hand back with other hand. Stretch underside of forearm.

exercises.name: Wrist Extensor Stretch
exercises.notes: Arm straight, push hand down with other hand. Stretch top of forearm.

exercises.name: Tendon Glides
exercises.notes: Make fist, then straight fingers, then hook fingers. Promotes tendon mobility.

name: Morning Pain Relief Routine
description: Comprehensive 20-minute morning routine to address computer-related pain and stiffness

exercises.name: Wrist Circles & Stretches
exercises.notes: Complete wrist mobility sequence for pain relief

exercises.name: Neck Rolls & Shoulder Shrugs
exercises.notes: Gentle neck mobility and shoulder tension release

exercises.name: Cat-Cow Stretches
exercises.notes: Spinal mobility and flexibility, counter desk posture

exercises.name: Hip Flexor Stretches
exercises.notes: Counter tight hips from prolonged sitting

exercises.name: Knee Circles & Calf Raises
exercises.notes: Knee and ankle health, circulation improvement

exercises.name: Deep Breathing Exercises
exercises.notes: Stress relief and oxygenation

exercises.name: Spinal Twists & Child's Pose
exercises.notes: Back pain relief and relaxation

name: Wrist-Friendly Upper Body Workout
description: Alternative exercises for building upper body strength without stressing the wrists

exercises.name: Chest Press Machine
exercises.notes: Replaces push-ups. No wrist weight-bearing, targets chest effectively.

exercises.name: Dumbbell Chest Press
exercises.notes: Alternative to push-ups. Grip dumbbells securely, neutral wrist position.

exercises.name: Wall Planks
exercises.notes: Replaces regular planks. Hands against wall, no wrist pressure.

exercises.name: Forearm Planks
exercises.notes: Core strengthening without wrist stress. Pressure on forearms.

exercises.name: Forearm Mountain Climbers
exercises.notes: Elbows on ground instead of hands. High intensity, wrist-safe.

exercises.name: Modified Burpees
exercises.notes: Step back instead of jump. Reduces wrist impact while maintaining intensity.

exercises.name: Chest Fly with Rotation
exercises.notes: Replaces push-up to T. Same muscle groups, no wrist pressure.

name: Recovery & Stretching Routine
description: Full body stretching and foam rolling for recovery and pain management

exercises.name: Leg Stretching Sequence
exercises.notes: Focus on hamstrings, quads, calves, and hip flexors

exercises.name: Foam Rolling - Legs
exercises.notes: Roll quads, hamstrings, IT band, and calves slowly

exercises.name: Full Body Stretching
exercises.notes: Complete body stretching sequence for all major muscle groups

exercises.name: Foam Rolling - Full Body
exercises.notes: Focus on back, shoulders, legs, and any tight areas

name: Pre-Game Football Preparation
description: Light warm-up routine specifically designed for football match preparation

exercises.name: Dynamic Warm-up
exercises.notes: Leg swings, arm circles, light jogging in place

exercises.name: Ball Touches
exercises.notes: Light ball work to get touch and rhythm

exercises.name: Movement Patterns
exercises.notes: Shuffles, cutting movements, acceleration drills

exercises.name: Mental Preparation
exercises.notes: Visualization, breathing exercises, focus techniques

name: Emergency Busy Day Minimum
description: Quick essential exercises for extremely busy days - absolute minimums

exercises.name: Essential Wrist Relief
exercises.notes: Non-negotiable pain relief routine for wrists and neck

exercises.name: Bodyweight Circuit
exercises.notes: Quick high-intensity bodyweight exercises or brisk walk

exercises.name: Evening Stretches
exercises.notes: Essential stretching routine to prevent stiffness
